entities.name: INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE
entities.description: The Internal Revenue Service (IRS) is the federal agency responsible for administering and enforcing the internal revenue laws in the United States, and it conducts audits on tax filings.

entities.name: PRODUCTIVITY AND BUSINESS PROCESSES
entities.description: Productivity and Business Processes is a segment of the business responsible for productivity-related software and services.

entities.name: INTELLIGENT CLOUD
entities.description: Intelligent Cloud is a segment of the business that includes cloud services, server products, and enterprise services.

entities.name: MORE PERSONAL COMPUTING
entities.description: More Personal Computing is a business segment that focuses on products and services related to personal computing.

relationships.relationship_description: IRS audits tax filings which can impact the financial outcomes reported by business segments like Productivity and Business Processes.
IRS audits tax filings affecting financial outcomes reported by business segments such as Intelligent Cloud.
IRS audits tax filings which can affect the financial outcomes reported by business segments like More Personal Computing.
